participant_1.background:
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.
i ride my bicycle everywhere.
I'm a creative teacher who loves to ride my moped and share my passion for writing with my students.
i enjoy hiking and riding my bicycle.
i enjoy writing for long periods of time.

participant_2.background:
I love my quiet home in the suburbs, but I often go into the city for fun and excitement.
I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band.
I wear bright colors and patterns to make me feel more confident and energetic.
i just bought my first home.
i love my job.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Hey there! It's going well, thank you! How about yours?
It's going great! I'm just finishing up a writing project.
That's awesome! I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band.
Oh cool! I love live music! What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of rock and pop.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure it will be a great show.
Thanks! We're really excited about it.
I bet! What's your favorite part about playing in a band?
I love the feeling of being on stage and performing for a crowd. It's so much fun to see people enjoying our music.
That's awesome! I can imagine it's a great feeling.
It is! It's a really rewarding experience.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you're having fun with it.
